title: Association of multimorbidity with guideline-directed medical therapy intensification in heart failure: Findings from the EPIC-HF trial
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Jonathan Lipsey, Larry A. Allen, Robert L. Page, Laura J. Helmkamp, Grace Venechuk, Katy E. Trinkley, Daniel D. Matlock, Colleen K. McIlvennan
